Promotion

#jestemzAGH cotton bag

Cotton bag with the name of the #jestemzAGH initiative and a unique Knowledge Passion Bond tag. Large and capacious with a wide bottom and long, broad handles. Made of high-quality material. Made in Poland. The bag comes in two colours: black and beige. Opis produktu colour: black or beige print colour: white or black type of print: screen printing material: 100% cotton weight: 260 g dimensions: 36 × 41 × 10 cm

+

40,00 PLN

Promotion

#jestemzAGH pin

Pin with the name of the #jestemzAGH initiative. It will be a perfect complement to your backpack, bag, or jacket. The pin comes in two colours: black and white. Opis produktu material: galvanised metal sheet colour: black with white inscription, white with black inscription dimensions: diameter – 5.6 cm

Promotion

AGH Shoelaces

A pair of white shoelaces with black “AGH” print, made from water- and abrasion-resistant material. Easy to tie, they are ideal for walks and runs. Product description: colour: white with black print length: 120 cm print type : screen printing material: nylon

+

7,50 PLN

10,00 PLN

Great Quality

Backpack

Case Logic black backpack with logo “AGH”. Compartment for 16” laptop, zippable organiser section with pocket for smartphone, little loop for pen, small pocket for valuables, and space for mobile phone cable. Upper pocket with special lining protects sunglasses or mobile phone from scratches. Useful front handle, and padded back panel. Unused part of shoulder strap can be folded and hidden. In zippable side pockets there is space for water bottle or cables. Made of high quality materials. Perfec

Torba na ramię z grafiką budynku AGH

Jasna torba bawełniana z grafiką budynku AGH. Duża i pojemna, z długimi uszami w kolorze butelkowej zieleni. Wykonana z wysokogatunkowego materiału. Produkcja polska.
